title.en: Are you sure you would like to upload your item?
title.sm: Ua e mautinoa e te mana'o e lafo atu lau item?

summary.en: Please ensure that you have followed the tips and tricks prior to submitting your item.
summary.sm: Faamolemole, ia faamautinoa muamua na e mulimuli muamua i le auala e pu'e ai lau item, i le itulau ua faamatuaina: Fautuaga.
